data.text: I have been there with my family for the first time and all I can say is Woow ... All the things were just perfect, the staff was highly professional and above all the Hotel environment was just an ideal place to be with the family. Highly recommend
data.title: Excellent, unforgettable, and enjoyed to the fullest üòç

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

It warms our hearts to read such great feedback from you.  Your recommendation, satisfaction, and knowing that  you had an excellent and memorable stay with us will further motivate us and make sure that our valued guests, such as you, will  have a wonderful experience every time they come to Royal Continental Suites.

Warm Regards,
Mohamed Turk
General Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Turk

data.text: Food was very good plus the stuff were really efficient in there work. Nice view and culture family with international atmosphere. And also the stuff were really friendly. Hope to visit this place again some day soon. I highly recommend this place especially for foreigners.
data.title: My experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience during your recent stay with us.  It is truly rewarding to  receive your recommendation and to know that you enjoyed your time, from the great food to the excellent  service and warm hospitality of our staff. It will be a pleasure to welcome you again soon at Royal Continental Suites  for another wonderful stay.

Best Regards,
Mohamed Turk
General Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Turk

data.text: Stayed at Royal continental Suites during my business trip in Dubai. Reception team, their knowledge and eagerness to assist with any inquiries or needs were commendable specially Arslan and Mostafa. The room were clean and the housekeeping did a great job cleaning the space. Meals were exceptional. Loving the outstanding location, best spot ever in Dubai. Would love to visit again.
data.title: Stay at Royal Continental Suites

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for choosing Royal Continental Suites and for sharing your review.  We are thrilled to know that we were able to meet your expectations and that you had a wonderful stay.  All our staff are dedicated in giving our valued guests a high standard of service, and we thank you for recognizing their efforts.  We are also glad to hear that you were happy with your dining experience, the cleanliness and the hotel's ideal location.  It will be a delight to welcome you again on your next visit to Dubai.

Warm Regards,
Mohamed Turk
General Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Turk

data.text: Fabulous stay at this hotel!.. they have a lot kitchen and everything in it!.. wonderful staff. Sanam and Afrid were my room attendants amazing. Super helpful and polite!‚Ä¶Sanam thank you for the extra bottle water because I am breastfeeding so considerate. The kids enjoyed the stay!. We had an amazing time here and can‚Äôt wait to come back. Thank you to the staff at the front desk. My husband tried the jacuzzi a bit warm not hot but it was nice. The only complaint I have is that we are a family of asthma so there is too much air freshener in the hallways. But once you close your door and open your balcony it‚Äôs much better. I hope that you can reduce the amount of air freshener or go with someone herbal like eucalyptus oil or peppermint oil. Otherwise amazing stay!!!!
data.title: Comfortable and happy!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

It warms our hearts to read about the amazing experience you had during your stay with us.  We are glad that you and your family had a comfortable and enjoyable stay.  Thank you for sharing your appreciation for the great service from our staff, specially Sanam and Afrid, we will surely pass on your kind words to them which will inspire them even further to always give their utmost, and make sure that our valued guests have a wonderful experience.  We value your feedback on the air freshener and rest assured that this will be addressed immediately.  It will be a pleasure to have you again at Royal Continental  Suites  where we will always be ready to welcome you with the warmest hospitality.

Best Regards,
Mohamed Turk
General Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Turk
